titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Balderton March 27. 1646. Being a day of humiliation thorow-out the whole army before Newark. / By Robert Ram minister of Spalding in Lincolnshire, and chaplaine to Colonell Rossiter.
titleStmt.author: Ram, Robert, d. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Advertisement signed "Ioseph Caryle" on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
